Summary I am a project manager focused on increasing the impact & scale of our sales efforts by designing and executing critical business projects impacting revenue & increasing employee productivity. 
 
I have over 7 years of business focused project management experience, leading and working with business sponsors, key business stakeholders & technical development team. Embracing technology & empowering the teams with finished products/tools that breaks down large advertiser data into smaller meaningful bundles of intelligence, enabling sales teams to approach the problems with powerful solutions. Part of my job also revolve around understanding the problems that sales team's face locally as well as globally, it ranges from identifying solutions across teams for recurring / time consuming / extremely inefficient processes; working with the product teams to understand, design & code (mostly in python) client ready automated collateral's that are used across the globe for sales pitches (including account management, optimization, cross selling, new product pitch etc); feature as a individual consultant to teams, helping them manage & execute smaller scale projects by lending them technical & functional support. 
 
My team & I have built a reputation of high degree of credibility & admiration among the sales organization, with recognition from India management as well as global business leaders. I'm extremely proud of the fact that what started as a mere project early in 2011 by a small team, have now carved a niche position for themselves & are considered pioneers of sales automation - impacting the work of 10,000+ strong sales organization, merging functional & technical side of business by bringing engineering closer to sales. Part of my job also revolve around understanding the problems that sales team's face locally as well as globally, it ranges from identifying solutions across teams for recurring / time consuming / extremely inefficient processes; working with the product teams to understand, design & code (mostly in python) client ready automated collateral's that are used across the globe for sales pitches (including account management, optimization, cross selling, new product pitch etc); feature as a individual consultant to teams, helping them manage & execute smaller scale projects by lending them technical & functional support. 
 
My team & I have built a reputation of high degree of credibility & admiration among the sales organization, with recognition from India management as well as global business leaders. Summary I am the sales strategy and analytics lead at Google Education. Over the past few years I’ve worked closely with Sales, Marketing, Finance, Product and Engineering to ensure the success of Google Education products. I’ve also built the entire reporting infrastructure for Google Education that connects internal data (sales, customer information, product usage) with market data from multiple sources providing a reliable and accurate view of the biggest areas of opportunity. 
 
Before Google I’ve worked in two different roles: as a telecommunications engineer and as a software developer. In both of these industries I’ve realized how passionate I am about technology and about leading businesses through analytics, having pursued opportunities that would get me there. 
 
I’ve graduated from Instituto Superior Tecnico in 2007 with a BS in Electrical and Computer Engineering and a MS in Telecommunications.
